mapper.select: SELECT cd.`cd_id`,c1.`cname`,c1.`schooltime`,stu.`sname`,cd.`class_hour`,cd.`price`, cd.`total`,cd.`September`,cd.`October`,cd.`November`,cd.`December`,cd.January,cd.February, cd.March,cd.April,cd.May,cd.June,cd.July,cd.August,cd.`book_price`,sum_tj.* FROM student stu LEFT JOIN cost_details cd ON stu.`sid`=cd.`stu_id` LEFT JOIN classes c1 ON c1.`class_id`=cd.`class_id` LEFT JOIN course c2 ON c2.`cid`=cd.`course_id`, (SELECT SUM(`total`)sum_total,SUM(`September`) sum_jiu,SUM(cd1.`October`)sum_shi,SUM(cd1.`November`)sum_shy, SUM(cd1.`December`)sum_she FROM cost_details cd1 WHERE cd1.`course_id`=3 AND cd1.`class_id` IN(22,23)) sum_tj WHERE c2.`cid`=3 AND c1.`class_id` IN(22,23) and stu.status=1 and cd.status=1 order by c1.schooltime
